sentence.text: We then constructed predictive gentranscription by RNA polymerase IIlized regression (GR) modeling with a supervised machine learning validation procedure with the target variable (cancer status) being specified to validate the results to allow enhanced prediction and reproducibility.

Additional predictors included age, as well as gender and the inttranscription by RNA polymerase IIction of MTHFR 677 with overweight status (measured by body mass index) in predicting CRC, with the cancer group having more men and overweight cases.
